extendedInfo.description: This powerful application let's you draw measures and dimensions on a photo. After photos are marked up with measurements, they can be send to anyone, or exported to the media gallery. Remember that a picture is worth a thousand words.An indispensable tool for construction workers, engineers, architects, carpenters, real estate agents, auction sellers, ...------------- Sketch -------------- Use a photo from the media library of your phone or take a new photo with the camera.- Dimension arrows: 5 types.- Angles- Text boxes to point out details.- Draw free-hand annotations.- Metric and imperial units: m, cm, mm, yd, ft, in and ft-in.- Different colors for arrows, angles and text boxes. Use the color that's the most visible on the picture or use a specific color for specific purposes.- Graphical indication of the dimension that will be moved, edited or erased.- Zoom function to work more precise.------------- Organize -------------- Custom photo names.By default, the photos are named for the current date and time. Long-press the photo to pop up the context menu that allows you to rename the photo.- Folders.Organize your drawings to folders to keep an overview by project, customer or location.------------- Share -------------- Share full size photos with measures and dimensions.- Share multiple drawings and folders with one click.

reviews.title: Rocks!
reviews.comment: Maybe there are some things to improve, but I haven \'t had any issues. Works perfect for me.
reviews.author: Dominic Falcione

reviews.title: Great app need little fixing
reviews.comment: Freeze all the time in my samsung note 2 but the concept is great waiting for updates
reviews.author: Juan Garcia

reviews.title: D-measures
reviews.comment: Great and useful application. I have all my windows saved for when the wife wants new drapes. It saves time and headaches
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Weird arrow
reviews.comment: when i select and move the arrow, the arrow didn\'t move. after that it move weird and hang. No force close. Hope dev can fix this. Thank you.
reviews.author: very gloriz

reviews.title: Great tool!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I need. One thing which would be awesome is once I get a couple lines measured, to auto estimate the length of new lines.
reviews.author: Jason Thomas

reviews.title: Great but....
reviews.comment: Often it is difficult to select the measuring arrows, I wish it could be used on my laptop. Excellent tool for construction tool
reviews.author: mark perez

reviews.title: Default save folder
reviews.comment: I can\'t select path for default folder on sd card. Path for sd for huawei g615 look \"/mnt/sdcard2/\". I can select folder only on \"/mnt/sdcard/\" this is internal storage.
reviews.author: Sergey Plokhikh

reviews.title: Great organizer!
reviews.comment: Love taking this to stores for remodeling.
reviews.author: Mary Klinker

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.comment: Works really well on my HTC Amaze 4G for the renos we are doing in our condo. Not compatible with my Nexus 7 as it has no camera. However, it would be nice if I could put it onto my Nexus 7 for contractor meetings and editing purposes.
reviews.author: Fred Anderson

reviews.title: Thumbs Up
reviews.comment: Works great for my purpose (architectural surveys). Seems stable and well-laid-out on my Motorola Xoom. Have yet to field test it heavily. UNDO button in Edit mode would help a great deal. Thank you.
reviews.author: Denys I.

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: Waste of time and money.  Pain in the rear to use

reviews.comment: Just perfect.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good user.

reviews.title: It\'s too unreliable
reviews.comment: It takes too long and troublesome to get to dimension measures, and then sometimes it does not save the marked up image. I can sketch and measure in a notebook faster and more reliable than this... A great idea but it\'s still has a long way to go.
